BBEX3.M.TTD.USD.CA.AB.A01: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Trinidad and Tobago / USD 1 = TTD ... (selling)
General: On 13 April 1993, the Trinidad and Tobago dollar ceased to be pegged to the US dollar.
Source: Central Bank of Trinidad and Tobago, Port-of-Spain.

Comment on 1993-04: On 13 April 1993, the Trinidad and Tobago dollar ceased to be pegged to the US dollar and a floating exchange rate was adopted.  We recorded the following exchange rates (buying/selling).  7 April 1993: USD 1 = TTD 4.24734 / 4.28719  13 April 1993: USD 1 = TTD 5.60000 / 5.76800  Calculated devaluation: 24.9% (middle rate).
Comment on 2003-01: Exchange rate as of 27 January 2003.
Comment on 2003-03: Exchange rate as of 26 March 2003.
Comment on 2003-09: Exchange rate as of 3 October 2003.
